summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1735, for the improvement of Pine Street, from Westlake Avenue to the alley between Seventh and Eighth Avenues; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by planking the same and constructing wood sidewalks thereon, under Ordinance No. 18406 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
